body: The `.clang-format` got changed recently to un-compact namespaces. Since I rewrote this file I had it clang-formatted entirely at the time, and assumed it safe to re-format it. But I agree this goes against autograd style. I will fix it
body_html: The .clang-format got changed recently to un-compact namespaces. Since I rewrote this file I had it clang-formatted entirely at the time, and assumed it safe to re-format it. But I agree this goes against autograd style. I will fix it
